page.title: 04Swimming Pool, Fraserburgh
page.content: The swimming pool is a very popular place in Fraserburgh for those who can swim and those who are learning.It has a shallow end only 3 ft deep for the non-swimmers and deepens to 10 ft for the good swimmers.It also has a diving board at the deep end.The building also has squash-courts and sauna. A swim for junior swimmers aged 4-17 costs 35p but you get 10p back after returning the key.Adults pay 60p also with a 10p refund.The swimming pool is open from 5pm-9pm during the week and from 11am-6pm on Saturday,and on Sunday 9am-12.30pm and 2pm-6pm.The swimming pool gives lessons on a Saturday morning which cost Â£5 for 10 weeks. The swimming pool is also used by the town's schools.
